numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I noticed that the Women's National Basketball Association has the same number of coaches of color as the National Basketball Association.
3. The graphs include head coaches of color.
4. The graphs do not include assistant coaches.
5. I ask why the graphs do not include assistant coaches.
6. I think that adding assistant coaches would increase the difference.
7. The graphs show managers in Major League Baseball.
8. The graphs do not show head coaches in Major League Baseball.
9. I ask why the graphs show managers in Major League Baseball instead of head coaches.
10. I read other responses to this question.
11. I concluded that the head coach of a Major League Baseball team is called a manager.
12. I ask why there are not many coaches of color in the National Football League.
13. I think that major sports leagues are becoming more diverse.
14. I think that this diversity can impact our lives.
